== Description ==

Converts a value to a non-negative integer.

Synonym of <tt>abs( intval( $foo ) )</tt>.

== Usage ==

%%%<?php absint( $maybeint ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$maybeint|mixed|Data you wish to have converted to a non-negative integer.}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||int|A non-negative integer.}}
